text: Autheuil-Authouillet is a commune in the Eure department in Normandy in northern France. It was the home of Simone Signoret and Yves Montand, after whom the village's main street, the rue Yves Montand, is named. ==Population== ==See also== *Communes of the Eure department ==References== Category:Communes of Eure
title: Autheuil-Authouillet
